channel.title: Ok please help me with my server
channel.description: when i add a thing on mopar for my server it says it needs to be online but i can get on from local host it says its online when i press run server i have a no-ip and ive compiled my server! please help

item.title: Ok please help me with my server
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

Jonnydpickle:

when i add a thing on mopar for my server it says it needs to be online but i can get on from local host it says its online when i press run server i have a no-ip and ive compiled my server! please help

no matter what, even if your internet is off any 1 whos actually running the server can connect, your server is online to others if you can login to your ip. so lets say

i login to 127.0.0.1 and it logs me in,

then i make a no-ip called test.no-ip.biz

i try to login to test.no-ip.biz and it says error- that = server is offline to others
else
i try to login to test.no-ip.biz and i login - that = your server is online to others

Read full topic
item.source: Ok please help me with my server

item.description:
@danimaster wrote:

well m8 i have the same problem as urs…and ive even done all stuf correctly…but i gave the files to my trusted m8 and he is currently running my server…but i hope people would fix ur prob…so mine would be fixed too!
